{"id":474557603,"lang":"cpp","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1617165254,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/474557603/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"The k-th Lexicographical String of All Happy Strings of Length n","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"#define v vector\n\nstring join(const vector<char> &lst, const string &delim) {\n    string ret;\n    for(const auto &s : lst) {\n        if(!ret.empty())\n            ret += delim;\n        ret += s;\n    }\n    return ret;\n}\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int n, k;\n    string ans = \"\";\n    string st = \"abc\";\n    int cnt = 0;\n    string getHappyString(int nn, int kk) {\n        n = nn, k = kk;\n        v<char> arr;\n        solve(0, arr, '*');\n        return ans;\n    }\n    void solve(int idx, v<char> &arr, char prev) {\n        if (cnt >= k) return;\n        if (idx >= n) {\n            cnt++;\n            if (cnt == k)\n                ans = join(arr, \"\");\n            return;\n        }\n        for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {\n            if (st[i] == prev) continue;\n            arr.push_back(st[i]);\n            solve(idx + 1, arr, st[i]);\n            arr.pop_back();\n        } \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"the-k-th-lexicographical-string-of-all-happy-strings-of-length-n"}
